=== Welcome ===
Welcome to the home of Mozilla extensions team. We are the guys and gals taking care of Mozilla extensions in Ubuntu. We deal with packaging and fixes, updates and reviewing suggested packages of Mozilla extensions. We try to make user's experience with Mozilla extensions in Ubuntu as pleasant as possible.

=== Contact ===
If you wish to contact the team, you can do so in several ways: the best way would be through the mailing list, the address is . We can also be found on IRC, on the Freenode server irc.freenode.net at #ubuntu-mozillateam.

=== How to join ===
A procedure on how to join the team is described <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/Team|here]]</nowiki>.

=== Getting involved ===
==== Suggesting a package ====
We keep a <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/List|list]]</nowiki> of all extensions that are packaged and suggested for packaging. If you have an extension which you would like to see in Ubuntu, try to find the details asked on mentioned wiki page. In case you find all needed info, add an entry in <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/List#head-f84cf31b6590ff2c4f296e1c5a4b1a8b8b115418|Needs maintainer]]</nowiki> table. In case that some information is missing, add an entry in <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/List#head-ba1c2f0c825dcf01e24b40f21445a87c46d39797|Missing details]]</nowiki> table.

==== Packaging ====
If you would like to prepare a package of extension, find an extension in <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/List#head-f84cf31b6590ff2c4f296e1c5a4b1a8b8b115418|Needs maintainer]]</nowiki> table. Take a look at <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/Packaging|packaging]]</nowiki> wiki page, and follow the procedure.

==== Updating ====
In case you need to update an extension, follow the procedure explained on our <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/Packaging#head-e9ae1ac834ae52ecc9f3e1bf3a7ee2af5d1af4a7|Packaging]]</nowiki> page.

==== Merging with Debian ====
If you would like to merge an extensions from Debian, see our <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Extensions/Merging|Merging]]</nowiki> page for information on what you need to keep in mind to do that.
